name: INFESTATION!
description:
Survive an alien bug invasion in which your life force is a magical glowing plant!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD -  Move around
  • Left Click/ X/SPACE - Shoot
  • E - Interact

** MOUSE RECCOMMENDED FOR SMOOTH GAMEPLAY**

-

Made in 2 weeks for the 2022 Cultivation Jam.
